content.raw: The update rate of 30Hz is because sensors are [updated in a loop](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/89b2ab89723ee24c90a50f8e88605e1d32328929/gazebo/Server.cc?at=default#cl-368), which each [Sensors::run_once](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/89b2ab89723ee24c90a50f8e88605e1d32328929/gazebo/sensors/Sensors.cc?at=default#cl-86) calls individual sensor updates [serially](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/89b2ab89723e/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc?at=default#cl-70), where the combined serial update rate is most likely limited to around 30Hz by image sensor updates due to image generation and memcopy from gpu to cpu memory.
content.html: The update rate of 30Hz is because sensors are updated in a loop, which each Sensors::run_once calls individual sensor updates serially, where the combined serial update rate is most likely limited to around 30Hz by image sensor updates due to image generation and memcopy from gpu to cpu memory.
